H0.text: the inner sanctuary of the parthenon where the statue of athena is located in known as the. Cellae

H1.text: the inner sanctuary of the parthenon where the statue of athena is located in known as the. Adyton

H2.text: the inner sanctuary of the parthenon where the statue of athena is located in known as the. Opisthodomos

H3.text: the inner sanctuary of the parthenon where the statue of athena is located in known as the. naos

A4.text: The lexicon states that this room was the western cella of the Parthenon.

A5.text: The only piece of sculpture from the Parthenon known to be from the hand of Phidias was the statue of Athena housed in the naos.
